item.description:
Barney Frank to defend Obama's health care plan at public meeting this Tuesday!

The mother of all Congressional "town hall" meetings on Obama's health care bill will be held this coming Tuesday, August 18, in Dartmouth, MA (near New Bedford)

Congressman Barney Frank will be in Dartmouth, MA to speak on health care reform and the financial implications of it. The meeting will be August 18 at 6:30 pm at the Dartmouth Council on Aging located at 628 Dartmouth Street, sponsored by the Dartmouth Democratic Town Committee.
item.name: Barney Frank Town Hall Meeting on Health Care
